SELECT hydu.user_id, hydu.username, hydu.mobile FROM ht_user hydu
JOIN ht_user_info info ON hydu.user_id = info.user_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ht_callcenter_service_users csu WHERE hydu.username = csu.username AND csu.assigned != 0 )
AND info.attribute = 0
AND hydu.reg_time <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 6 MONTH) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT tender.user_id FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender tender JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow borrow ON tender.borrow_nid = borrow.borrow_nid JOIN ht_user hydu ON tender.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE borrow.`status` = 4 )
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT hydu.user_id, hydu.username, hydu.mobile FROM ht_user hydu
JOIN ht_user_info info ON hydu.user_id = info.user_id
JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_account account ON account.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ht_callcenter_service_users csu WHERE hydu.username = csu.username AND csu.assigned != 0 )
AND info.attribute = 0
AND account.bank_total <= 50
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT tender.user_id FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender tender JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow borrow ON tender.borrow_nid = borrow.borrow_nid JOIN ht_user hydu ON tender.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE borrow.`status` = 4 )
AND ( SELECT SUM(t.account) FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender t WHERE t.user_id = hydu.user_id ) >= 5000
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT hydu.user_id, hydu.username, hydu.mobile FROM ht_user hydu WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ht_callcenter_service_users csu WHERE hydu.username = csu.username AND csu.assigned != 0) ORDER BY hydu.reg_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t.*, `od3`.`name` AS `regionName`, `od2`.`name` AS `branchName`, `od`.`name` AS `departmentName` FROM ( SELECT hydu.user_id, hydu.username AS user_name, hydui.truename AS real_name, hydu.mobile, hydu.user_type AS user_type, hydui.role_id AS user_role, hydui.attribute AS user_property, hydui.birthday, hydui.sex, hydui.idcard, concat( province,city,area) as regist_area, hydu.open_account, hydu.open_account AS account_status, hydu.`status` AS user_status, hydu.reg_esb AS regist_plat, hydu.reg_time as regTime, hydur.username AS recommend_name, FROM_UNIXTIME( hydu.reg_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS reg_time, CASE WHEN hydui.attribute = 2 OR hydui.attribute = 3 THEN hydu.user_id ELSE hydsu.spreads_user_id END AS hyd_id, hydui.borrower_type, hydu.bank_open_account bank_open_account,
DATE_FORMAT(hboa.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS bank_open_time, hboa.account AS bank_account FROM ht_user hydu LEFT JOIN ht_user_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_spreads_user hydsu ON hydsu.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_user hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydsu.spreads_user_id LEFT JOIN ht_bank_open_account hboa ON hydu.user_id = hboa.user_id ) t LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users ou ON ou.hyd_id = t.hyd_id AND ou.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department od ON od.id = ou.departmentid AND od.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department od2 ON od2.id = od.parentid LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department od3 ON od3.id = od2.parentid
ORDER BY t.reg_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT IF(vi.vip_level=1,"欢迎礼包","升级礼包") FROM ht_vip_auth va LEFT JOIN ht_vip_info vi ON va.vip_id=vi.id WHERE va.coupon_code = #{couponSource}
